_comment_terraformModules: This field is used to specify external Terraform modules that your CDKTF app might consume
_comment_context_allowSepCharsInLogicalI: allowSepCharsInLogicalIdstrue: This allows the use of separator characters (e.g., dashes - or underscores _) in logical IDs, which can make resource names more readable.When set to true, CDKTF can generate resource names like my-resource-id instead of concatenating names without separators.
